movie_title: Weight-loss drugs reduce cancer risk, study finds: BBC Learning English from the News
introduction: Is this a new era of preventative cancer medicine? üîé For a free worksheet, and all the vocabulary a

vocabulary.definition: the act of putting a needle into the skin to insert medicine
vocabulary.example: The doctor gave me an injection to help with the pain.

vocabulary.definition: intended to stop something bad from happening in the future
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise and a healthy diet are preventative measures against heart disease.

vocabulary.definition: a localized physical condition in which part of the body becomes reddened, swollen, hot, and often painful
vocabulary.example: The athlete's knee showed signs of inflammation after the intense workout.

vocabulary.definition: a verb followed by one or more particles (typically prepositions or adverbs) that together form a single semantic unit
vocabulary.example: Learning English students often struggle with understanding the meanings of phrasal verbs.

vocabulary.definition: the employees of a business or organization
vocabulary.example: The company had to downsize its workforce due to financial difficulties.

vocabulary.definition: a numerical quantity that is not a whole number (e.g., 1/2, 0.5)
vocabulary.example: She divided the cake into equal fractions to share with her friends.
